awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win.

fullplot: An Army medic brings his girlfriend to stay with him at an out of the way Vietnam outpost in 1967, the woman disappears one day and he begins searching for her.
plot: An Army medic brings his girlfriend to stay with him at an out of the way Vietnam outpost in 1967, the woman disappears one day and he begins searching for her.
title: A Soldier's Sweetheart
writers: Tim O'Brien (short story "Sweetheart of the Song Tra Bong")
